author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Immersion Enters Into Multi-Year License Agreement With Bosch
text:
March 7 (Reuters) - Immersion Corp:
* IMMERSION ENTERS INTO MULTI-YEAR LICENSE AGREEMENT WITH BOSCH
* IMMERSION ENTERS INTO MULTI-YEAR LICENSE AGREEMENT WITH BOSCH
* IMMERSION CORP - ‍BOSCH TO INCORPORATE IMMERSION’S HAPTICS TECHNOLOGY IN AUTOMOTIVE APPLICATIONS​
* IMMERSION CORP - ‍ SIGNED A MULTI-YEAR LICENSE AGREEMENT WITH ROBERT BOSCH CAR MULTIMEDIA GMBH​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
